title: Loving Hut - Edgware
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, Western, Buffet, Take-out, Asian
description: Previously named Mr. Man and converted to a branch of Loving Hut chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Offers an extensive all vegan menu that includes fish and chips, burger and chips, Asian dishes, dim sum, and vegan desserts.
